name: The Bling
description: The Bling is a hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Humboldt Frost, Reserve OG, and Humboldt Gelato. This strain is 50% sativa and 50% indica. The Bling is named after the abundance of trichomes found on the green and purple buds, giving them a shiny and sparkly appearance. The Bling is 19% THC and 1% CBG, making this strain a medium-high choice for beginners and experienced cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us The Bling effects include feeling euphoric, energetic, and uplifted. Medical marijuana patients often choose The Bling when dealing with symptoms associated with depression, anxiety, and PTSD. Bred by Humboldt Seed Company and Happy Dreams Farm, The Bling features flavors like gassy, sweet, and floral. The dominant terpene of this strain is unknown. The average price of The Bling typically ranges from $35-$45 per eighth. The Bling has a potent and ethereal high that can elevate your mood and make you feel like youâ€™re floating on a cloud.
